name: Dlgallery-angularjs
tagline: Simple, barebones, gallery module made with AngularJS.
body:
# dlGallery-AngularJS Simple, barebones, gallery module made with AngularJS. Edit style as necessary. Use "< dl-gallery > " tags in your html when referencing it with any parameters you want to setup. Meant as a starting point or placeholder to save time when switching to a more complex gallery to fit specific application needs. Requires the following dependencies: ngAnimate, ui.bootstrap, angular-loading-bar, ngTouch, and bootstrapLightbox. # Sample Usage ```html

Gallery Module

```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
